weka.gui.knowledgeflow

Class StepTreeLeafDetails

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.gui.knowledgeflow.StepTreeLeafDetails
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class StepTreeLeafDetails
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Maintains information about a step in the StepTree - e.g. tool tip text, wrapped algorithm name (in the case of a WekaAlgorithmWrapper.
    Version:
    $Revision: $
    Author:
    Mark Hall (mhall{[at]}pentaho{[dot]}com)
    See Also:
